::KitKat::

She looked at Megatron.  "We will hae to wait on the maximals for a 
bit. We have bigger concerns right now.  We need to get rid of the 
allience. Once the Allience is crushed, then we can get the maximals. 
The Allience helps the maximals and right now, they are very strong. 
We get rid of the Allience and we can get the maximals all that much 
easier."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Tarantulas looked up from the bloddy Rat Trap. "I have no 
clue....you 
> might want to scan for her. I bet shes with some other bot....." 
And then 
> shut his commlink. He wanted to make Quickstrike paranoid.
> 
>     Megatron nodded. Excellent. This was a good idea. "Good....and 
when shall 
> we decide on the Maximal matter?"
> 
>     Nighteyes glared with a smile. Megatron was going to love 
this. "Well, 
> Ill be going now. Um....but I wouldnt make any long term plans. Tee 
Hee 
> Hee..." She laughed and walked away. Her optronic eye camera was 
sending the 
> images right back to Megatron lair. When he got home he was going 
to be mad.
>     Being a spy was good.
